医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究确定了基因组中与 PTSD 风险相关的 95 个位置在创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 中，遭受创伤后的侵入性想法、情绪变化和其他症状会极大地影响一个人的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Study-pinpoints-95-locations-in-the-genome-linked-with-risk-of-developmenting-PTSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Study-pinpoints-95-locations-in-the-genome-linked-with-risk-of-developmenting-PTSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747d4221-dcad-4942-98a2-7e339e6be996 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 14:04:41 -0400 Study pinpoints 95 locations in the genome associated with risk of developing PTSD
ChatGPT 在多药房管理方面展现出前景多重用药，即同时使用五种或更多药物，在老年人中很常见，会增加不良药物相互作用的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-polypharmacy-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-polypharmacy-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e102eeda-f206-4a83-b9ee-fc27c34d009a Thu, 18 Apr 2024 14:00:38 -0400 ChatGPT shows promise in polypharmacy management
新血管细胞类型的发现可能为治疗心血管疾病的新策略铺平道路心血管疾病，包括中风和心肌梗塞，是世界上最主要的死亡原因，每年导致超过 1800 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Discovery-of-new-angio-cell-type-may-pave-way-for-novel-strategies-to-treat-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Discovery-of-new-angio-cell-type-may-pave-way-for-novel-strategies-to-treat-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4c6da98-a156-4692-86cf-7cfaf98efc49 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 13:46:32 -0400 Discovery of new vascular cell type may pave way for novel strategies to treat cardiovascular diseases
通过量身定制的运动处方优化餐后血糖控制研究人员阐明了各种运动参数影响健康和糖尿病个体的餐后血糖反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Optimize-postprandial-glycemic-control-with-tailored-exercise-prescriptions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Optimize-postprandial-glycemic-control-with-tailored-exercise-prescriptions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23a1c5ce-598b-4232-9166-98bc2bdf9f45 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 11:04:00 -0400 Optimize postprandial glycemic control with tailored exercise prescriptions
酸奶在预防糖尿病和肥胖症中的作用酸奶作为营养食品在预防和控制糖尿病和肥胖方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-role-of-yogurt-in-diabetes-and-obesity-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-role-of-yogurt-in-diabetes-and-obesity-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=579ea69e-592d-4b90-a126-240a19f308e6 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 10:45:00 -0400 The role of yogurt in diabetes and obesity prevention

Sapio Sciences 为其实验室信息学平台推出新的多模式注册功能Sapio Sciences 增强了其实验室信息学平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Sapio-Sciences-launches-new-multimodal-registration-capability-for-its-lab-informatics-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Sapio-Sciences-launches-new-multimodal-registration-capability-for-its-lab-informatics-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd4c9555-96a9-4bf1-a44d-b2055982828e Thu, 18 Apr 2024 10:26:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences launches new multimodal registration capabilities for its lab informatics platform
2 期试验显示 Lixisenatide 可减少帕金森病患者的运动障碍一项利西拉来试验，旨在评估其对早期帕金森病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Phase-2-trial-reveals-Lixisenatide-may-reduce-motor-disability-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Phase-2-trial-reveals-Lixisenatide-may-reduce-motor-disability-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d377d95a-a1df-4535-aecb-561f79125a6f Thu, 18 Apr 2024 10:13:00 -0400 Phase 2 trial reveals Lixisenatide may reduce motor disability in Parkinson’s patients
美国药典 (USP) 和 Mestrelab Research, SL (Mestrelab)美国药典 (USP) 和 Mestrelab Research, SL (Mestrelab) 很高兴地宣布，他们已达成合作，通过 Mestrelab 的 Mnova 平台提供 USP-ID。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-US-Pharmacopeia-(USP)-and-Mestrelab-Research-SL-(Mestrelab).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-US-Pharmacopeia-(USP)-and-Mestrelab-Research-SL-(Mestrelab).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc028afd-0b4f-468e-93df-f86a67084ff3 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:54:00 -0400 The U.S. Pharmacopeia (USP) and Mestrelab Research, S.L. (Mestrelab)
B Medical Systems 的太阳能直接疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 获得 ACT 标签医疗冷链行业的领先企业 B Medical Systems 自豪地宣布，其太阳能直驱疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 已获得 My Green Lab 著名的 ACT 标签。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4263b105-98f8-4e2a-9307-07f921b9addc Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:27:00 -0400 B Medical Systems’ Solar Direct Vaccine Refrigerator and Ice-Pack Freezer, the TCW40SDD, Receives the ACT Label
